Text:
Thanks! This has poor quality mono sound. I fixed it up here: 
http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7219106/Coldplay_ft_Rihanna_-_Princess_Of_China_%28Tour_Version__CDA_Sourc

@TorrentG0110

I've checked this with several media players but the sound is stereo.
The left and right tracks are mirrors of each other. Can't you hear how bad it sounds? It's mono copied to the other track.
